languages.text: Grants +25 Logic. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 penalty. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Grants +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic bonus is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

Grants +25 Logic. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 penalty. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

languages.text: 获得+25{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}逻辑{/g}。 装备者获得决心圣像{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，此能力会消耗3点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。装备者需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:Test}逻辑{/g}检定，且在此次检定中受到-167{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若检定成功，则移除决心圣像效果，摧毁认知圣像。装备者会失去+25逻辑加值，但会永久获得悖论解除特性。 悖论解除：此角色可以无视{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}要求使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，且英雄壮举不消耗士气值。
languages.original_text: Grants +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic bonus is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: 获得+25{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}逻辑{/g}。 装备者获得决心圣像{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，此能力消耗3点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。发动此能力后，装备者需要进行逻辑{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，并在此次检定中承受-167{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若检定成功，装备者失去决心圣像能力。装备者可以无视{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}要求，直接使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，不会消耗任何士气，也不会将{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}英雄壮举{/g}进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却{/g}状态。

languages.text: Дает +25 к Логике. Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Симулякр неоспоримости, которая требует 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и заставляет выполнить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Логики со штрафом −167. В случае успеха способность исчезает, предмет Когнисимулякр уничтожается и {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +25 к логике пропадает, а персонаж навсегда получает умение Парадокс неоспоримости. Парадокс неоспоримости: этот персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при любом значении {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. При этом расхода моментума не происходит.
languages.original_text: Grants +25 Logic. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 penalty. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Дает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логике{/g}. Персонаж получает способность Симулякр неоспоримости, которая требует 3 ОД и заставляет выполнить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Логики со штрафом −167. В случае успеха способность исчезает, а персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при любом значении {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g}. При этом расхода моментума не происходит, а {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}героический акт{/g} не требует {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}периода восстановления{/g}.

Дает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логике{/g}. Персонаж получает способность Симулякр неоспоримости, которая требует 3 ОД и заставляет выполнить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Логики со штрафом −167. В случае успеха способность исчезает, а персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} при любом значении {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g}. При этом расхода моментума не происходит, а {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}героический акт{/g} не требует {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}периода восстановления{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}を25獲得する。 使用者は偽物判別の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得して、このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を3消費し、使用者に-167の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う論理{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を要求する。成功すると、偽物判別 が取り除かれて、コグニ-シミュラクラムが破壊され、25の論理ボーナスを失い、 使用者はそのまま残るパラドックス判別を獲得する。 パラドックス判別：このキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}の量に関わらず、推進力を消費することなく{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を実行できる。
languages.original_text: Grants +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic bonus is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}を25獲得する。 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を3消費する偽物判別{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得し、{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}167で使用者に論理{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を発動する。合格すると偽物判別が取り除かれ、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}量に関わらず{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用することができ、推進力を消費したり{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}英雄的行為{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}を設定する必要はない。

languages.text: Otorga +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Lógica{/g}. El portador obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Simulacro de resolución, que cuesta 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y activa una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Lógica para el portador con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −167. Si la supera, Simulacro de resolución se elimina, el cognisimulacro se destruye, la bonificación de +25 de Lógica se pierde y el portador obtiene permanentemente la aptitud Paradoja resuelta. Paradoja resuelta: este personaje puede usar su {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} independientemente del valor de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} y no lo consume.
languages.original_text: Grants +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic bonus is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Otorga +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Lógica{/g}. El portador obtiene la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Simulacro de resolución, que cuesta 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y permite al portador activar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Lógica con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −167 . Si lo consigue, Simulacro de resolución se elimina y el portador puede usar su {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} independientemente de la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} que tenga, sin gastar ímpetu y activando el {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}acto heroico{/g}.

languages.text: Gewährt +25 Logik. Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Simulacrum auflösen, die 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet und eine Logik-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} für den Träger mit einem Abzug von −167 auslöst. Ist sie erfolgreich, wird Simulacrum auflösen entfernt, das Cogni-Simulacrum zerstört, der Logik-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +25 aufgehoben und der Träger erhält dauerhaft das Feature Paradox gelöst. Paradox gelöst: Dieser Charakter kann seine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} ungeachtet seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} einsetzen, ohne Dynamik zu verbrauchen.
languages.original_text: Grants +25 Logic. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 penalty. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Gewährt +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logik{/g}. Der Träger erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Simulacrum auflösen, die 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet und eine Logik-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -167 beim Nutzer auslöst. Bei Erfolg wird Simulacrum auflösen entfernt und der Träger kann seine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} ungeachtet seines {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g}-Wertes einsetzen, ohne Dynamik zu verbrauchen und die {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}Heldentat{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} zu setzen.

languages.text: Confère +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g}. L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Résolution du Simulacrum pour 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et déclenche un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de Logique avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −167. Si l'utilisateur réussit ce test, la capacité Résolution du Simulacrum lui est retirée, le Cogni-Simulacrum est détruit, le bonus de +25 de logique est retiré et l'utilisateur reçoit de façon permanente la caractéristique Paradoxe résolu. Paradoxe résolu : ce personnage peut utiliser son {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, indépendamment du nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} dont il dispose et sans dépenser de fougue.
languages.original_text: Grants +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic bonus is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

traits.locale_text: Confère +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g}. L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Résolution du Simulacrum pour 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et déclenche un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de Logique avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -167. Si l'utilisateur réussit ce test, la capacité Résolution du Simulacrum lui est retirée et il peut utiliser son {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, indépendamment du nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} dont il dispose, sans dépenser de points de fougue, et mettre l'{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}acte héroïque{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}mode récupération{/g}.

Confère +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g}. L'utilisateur acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Résolution du Simulacrum pour 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et déclenche un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de Logique avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -167. Si l'utilisateur réussit ce test, la capacité Résolution du Simulacrum lui est retirée et il peut utiliser son {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, indépendamment du nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} dont il dispose, sans dépenser de points de fougue, et mettre l'{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}acte héroïque{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}mode récupération{/g}.
